extendedInfo.description: The most effective way to Speak & Learn Spanish.You can start speaking Spanish RIGHT AWAY! Even if you don't know a word of the language. No drills or boring grammar. This innovative 'EasyTalk' method is so easy and so fast that you'll be speaking Spanish within minutes â GUARANTEED!STOP STUDYING SPANISH AND START TO SPEAK SPANISH!Key features:* Over 4000 most useful words and phrases* Authentic native speaker voice* 128 different topics and dialogs* Innovative 'build-your-phrase' feature to compose thousands of new expressions* User defined 'Favorites' folders* Sample of dialogs based on real life situations* Learning language mode to memorize words and expressions* Multiple search functions to find phrases quickly and easily * Simplified transliteration of Spanish words and expressions* Learn Spanish pronunciation* Integrated player that plays all the selected phrases aloud in a continuous flow* Spanish travel phrasebook* User friendly interface* No internet connection needed'EasyTalk Learn Spanish' is the easiest and fastest way to START SPEAKING Spanish. The app can be used as a language teacher and personal travel translator. With it you will always be understood. It contains over 4000 carefully selected, essential words and phrases spoken by professional native speakers.With our SMART 'build-your-own-phrase' feature you can easily compose thousands of relevant phrases covering almost all everyday situations.A 'Favorites' capability allows you to save your most important phrases in your personal 'Favorites' folders that can be accessed by one click.The phrases are carefully organized into 14 main topics and 114 subtopics.A FAST search facility allows you to find the phrase you are looking for quickly and effortlessly. The application does not require an internet connection to function.DIALOGS:- Tourist Information- At the Border- At the Post Office- Airport Check-in- Making Conversation- Travelling by Train- Out of Town- Hotel Complaints- Asking the Time- Asking the Way- Asking the Way 2- Job Seeking- At the Doctor's- Around Town- At the Hotel Reception- At the Restaurant- At the Clothes Shop- At the Grocer's- Exchange Office- Car Rental- Car Accident- SightseeingTOPIC AREAS:- Accommodation- Asking the Way- Food- Health- Shopping- Leisure- Meeting People- Travel- Numbers/Time- Public Places- Work/Study- Nature- EssentialsThis is the Trial version of the application. The functionality of the Trial and Full version are the same except for the number of phrases. The Trial version contains 800 words and expressions while the Full version includes over 4000 words, phrases and sentences.

reviews.title: Hangs, and no fun
reviews.comment: It hangs a lot and is no fun learning, just words.
reviews.author: D\303\251sir\303\251e Nordlund

reviews.title: Non informative
reviews.comment: This is not an app you want to use if you actually want to learn the full language
reviews.author: Kaylana Juarez

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time with this app
reviews.comment: Very few phrases, mostly vocabulary. Useless for learning Spanish. A free dictionary app would be more useful. Avoid this app and look for another.
reviews.author: John Lin

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: You have to pay to use anything useful in this app. Takes away from the whole mobile experience, if I have to pay id rayher do it on my computer...
reviews.author: Christina Yotsuji

reviews.title: No bueno
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing on Galaxy note 10.1, Free version gives you next to nothing , you must buy the app to get anything of substance
reviews.author: Neil Flegel

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: A very good and informative app.
reviews.author: SAAD GHAZI A.AZIZ
